All-Female Crews Handle Hockey Broadcasts, But Women’s Worlds Tournament Cancelled Due To Coronavirus
International Women's Day is bringing wins for female hockey broadcasters in the U.S. and Canada, but the top women's players have lost the opportunity to skate in their biggest event of the year after the IIHF cancelled the 2020 Women's World Championship on Saturday.

Japan has now seen 14 deaths from the virus of which seven were from the Diamond Princess cruise ship that had been quarantined off Yokohama.
